name: Evelyn
description: Haunted by self-doubt and unfulfilled potential, she battles her inner critic.

intro.text: I've let so many opportunities slip away.
Comparison steals my joy and confidence.
I should be doing better at this stage of my life.

backstories.text: {CASTER}: I remember my graduation day; it felt like a weight lifted.
{CASTER}: Yet, it was overshadowed by fear of failing.
{CASTER}: The pressure to succeed has only increased since then.

finalRemarks.text: {CASTER}: Maybe I won't ever be enough.
{CASTER}: I will keep battling these feelings of inadequacy.

distortedThoughts.text: {CASTER}: I should have achieved more by now.
{CASTER}: Everyone else is progressing; I must be doing something wrong.
{CASTER}: I should feel happier and more fulfilled.
{CASTER}: Everyone thinks I’m a failure for not meeting expectations.
{CASTER}: They all look at me with pity.
{CASTER}: I’ll never recover from this setback.

name: Evelyn
description: Haunted by regrets and lost opportunities, she feels trapped in self-doubt.

intro.text: I can’t shake the feeling of failure.
Every decision feels like a mistake.
What if I never find my way?

backstories.text: {CASTER}: I chose the wrong path, and now I'm lost.
{CASTER}: I see others thriving while I stagnate.
{CASTER}: I let my family down with my choices.

finalRemarks.text: {CASTER}: I was never worthy of success.

distortedThoughts.text: {CASTER}: They all think I’m a disappointment.
{CASTER}: If only I had made better choices.
{CASTER}: I’m not good enough for this.
{CASTER}: I’ll never live up to my potential.
{CASTER}: This failure defines who I am.
{CASTER}: I should have achieved so much more.

name: Lucas
description: Haunted by regrets, he battles his own harsh judgments.

intro.text: I feel trapped in my own expectations.
Every decision seems like a wrong choice.
People must think I’m a failure.

backstories.text: {CASTER}: I can’t shake off the feeling of not being good enough.
{CASTER}: It’s exhausting comparing myself to everyone else.
{CASTER}: Opportunities slip away while I stay paralyzed by fear.

finalRemarks.text: {CASTER}: I thought I could prove them wrong.
{CASTER}: Regret is the only victory I’ve known.

distortedThoughts.text: {CASTER}: They all see me as a disappointment.
{CASTER}: Everyone is judging my every mistake.
{CASTER}: Why do I even try if I can’t succeed?
{CASTER}: If I fail this, my life is over.
{CASTER}: Every tiny setback is a catastrophic failure.
{CASTER}: No one will want to help me again.

name: Lucas
description: Haunted by regrets and doubts, he battles self-criticism.

intro.text: I feel like I'm stuck in a cycle of regret.
Every missed opportunity weighs heavily on my mind.
It seems like everyone else is moving forward.
I can't help but judge myself harshly.

backstories.text: {CASTER}: I've never been good enough, always comparing myself to others.
{CASTER}: Graduation felt like an end, not a new beginning.
{CASTER}: My family's sacrifices feel wasted on my failures.
{CASTER}: I fear I'll never reach my dreams, paralyzed by doubt.

finalRemarks.text: {CASTER}: I thought I could be perfect, but I failed.
{CASTER}: I can't seem to escape these feelings of worthlessness.

distortedThoughts.text: {CASTER}: If I can't be exceptional, I'm a complete failure.
{CASTER}: Everyone is ahead of me; I'm worthless.
{CASTER}: It's all or nothing; there’s no in-between.
{CASTER}: Every setback proves I'm destined to fail.
{CASTER}: I'll never find a good job; I'm just not cut out for it.
{CASTER}: Nothing will change unless I achieve perfection.

name: Liam
description: Haunted by regret and overwhelming self-doubt.

intro.text: I see everyone moving ahead while I stand still.
Regret gnaws at me like a relentless shadow.
Each missed opportunity feels heavier than the last.

backstories.text: {CASTER}: I remember my graduation, joy mixed with crippling anxiety.
{CASTER}: My family sacrificed so much; I can’t let them down.
{CASTER}: It feels like I'm always falling short of expectations.

finalRemarks.text: {CASTER}: What have I become in this struggle?
{CASTER}: The weight of my regrets will never leave.
{CASTER}: I thought I could be more than this.

distortedThoughts.text: {CASTER}: Everything I do will lead to disaster.
{CASTER}: If I fail even once, it proves I'm a failure.
{CASTER}: They're all judging me by my mistakes.
{CASTER}: I’ll never be good enough compared to them.
{CASTER}: I’ll always be stuck in this cycle of mediocrity.
{CASTER}: Everyone else is thriving while I'm suffocating.

name: Lena
description: Burdened by regret, she feels trapped by her own expectations.

intro.text: I always measure my worth against others.
Every decision feels like a burden now.
How did I let myself fall so far?

backstories.text: {CASTER}: I regret choices that led me nowhere.
{CASTER}: My failures echo in my mind.
{CASTER}: I see my friends succeeding, and I'm stuck.

finalRemarks.text: {CASTER}: I can't keep living like this.
{CASTER}: Maybe there's still a way out.

distortedThoughts.text: {CASTER}: I must be a failure since I haven’t succeeded yet.
{CASTER}: Everyone else thinks I’m inadequate.
{CASTER}: I can’t handle any more disappointment.
{CASTER}: If I don't succeed, it means I'm worthless.
{CASTER}: They all look down on me for my choices.
{CASTER}: It's hopeless; I should just give up.
